module.name: gtk-engines
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl" ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Ae -z +O2 +Ofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix*) CC=c99 CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK+${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO+${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB+${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK+${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO+${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_GDKPIXBUF+${SB_VAR_GDKPIXBUF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datarootdir=${_datadir} --datadir=${_datadir} \ --disable-silent-rules --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: lighthouseblue
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl" ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Ae -z +O2 +Ofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix*) CC=c99 CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK+${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO+${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB+${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK+${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO+${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_GDKPIXBUF+${SB_VAR_GDKPIXBUF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: gtk-xfce
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl" ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Ae -z +O2 +Ofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix*) CC=c99 CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK+${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO+${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB+${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK+${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO+${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_GDKPIXBUF+${SB_VAR_GDKPIXBUF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir=${_datadir} --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

note.para: The following GTK 2.12.x themes are available:

Unlike GTK+ 1.2, it is not enough to add an entry to ~/.gtkrc-2.0 for a theme to work. GTK+ 2.12 searches the default installation directory for theme engines and, because themes installed with this package are installed outside of the default GTK+ 2.12 search directory, the "GTK_PATH" environment variable must be used to specify additional search paths for theme engines. Therefore, augment the colon-separated path list of ``GTK_PATH'' with the following to enable the themes to work if the selected theme does not work by default:
Setting the GTK_PATH variable should be done as a last resort as a wrapper script has been created for GNOME and GTK+ 2.12.x applications to automatically set GTK_PATH.
To use the Metal theme, add the following to ~/.gtkrc-2.0:
To use the Redmond95 theme, add the following to ~/.gtkrc-2.0:
To use the ThinIce theme, add the following to ~/.gtkrc-2.0:
To use the XFce theme, add one of the following to ~/.gtkrc-2.0:
